name: Mulberry Lane Apartment
address: Mulberry Lane, Viet Kieu Chau Au Village, Ha Dong District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located 9 km from Hanoi and 37 km from Yên Bài, Mulberry Lane Apartment offers accommodation in Dich Vong Trung. This apartment provides an outdoor pool and free WiFi. Free private parking is available on site.

The kitchen comes with a microwave. A flat-screen TV is provided. There is a private bathroom with a hot tub.

You can play table tennis and mini-golf at the property, and the area is popular for cycling. Noi Bai International Airport is 25 km away.
